Class Administration.ProtectionCommands

Commands for managing the Anti-Alt, Anti-Raid, and Anti-Spam protection settings.

Methods

| Edit this page View Source

AntiAlt()

Disables the Anti-Alt protection for the guild.

Declaration
[Cmd("AntiAlt")]
[Aliases("AntiAlt")]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
[UserPerm(GuildPermission.Administrator)]
public Task AntiAlt()
Returns
Type Description
Task
Remarks

This command is restricted to users with Administrator permissions.

| Edit this page View Source

AntiAlt(StoopidTime, PunishmentAction, IRole)

Configures the Anti-Alt protection for the guild, setting the minimum account age and punishment action with a role-based punishment.

Declaration
[Cmd("AntiAlt")]
[Aliases("AntiAlt")]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
[UserPerm(GuildPermission.Administrator)]
public Task AntiAlt(StoopidTime minAge, PunishmentAction action, IRole role)
Parameters
Type Name Description
StoopidTime minAge

The minimum age (in minutes) for accounts to be considered as alts.
PunishmentAction action

The punishment action to be taken against detected alts. PunishmentAction
IRole role

The role to be assigned to detected alts as punishment.
Returns
Type Description
Task
Remarks

This command is restricted to users with Administrator permissions.

| Edit this page View Source

AntiAlt(StoopidTime, PunishmentAction, StoopidTime?)

Configures the Anti-Alt protection for the guild, setting the minimum account age and punishment action.

Declaration
[Cmd("AntiAlt")]
[Aliases("AntiAlt")]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
[UserPerm(GuildPermission.Administrator)]
public Task AntiAlt(StoopidTime minAge, PunishmentAction action, StoopidTime? punishTime = null)
Parameters
Type Name Description
StoopidTime minAge

The minimum age (in minutes) for accounts to be considered as alts.
PunishmentAction action

The punishment action to be taken against detected alts. PunishmentAction
StoopidTime punishTime

Optional: The duration of the punishment, if applicable.
Returns
Type Description
Task
Remarks

This command is restricted to users with Administrator permissions.

| Edit this page View Source

AntiList()

Displays the current status of anti-protection settings.

Declaration
public Task AntiList()
Returns
Type Description
Task
Remarks

This command provides information about the active anti-protection settings in the server, including Anti-Spam, Anti-Raid, and Anti-Alt. It does not require any specific permissions to use.

AntiRaid(int, int, PunishmentAction)

Configures the Anti-Raid protection for the guild, setting the user threshold, detection time window, and punishment action.

Declaration
[Cmd("AntiRaid")]
[Aliases("AntiRaid")]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
[UserPerm(GuildPermission.Administrator)]
[Priority(2)]
public Task AntiRaid(int userThreshold, int seconds, PunishmentAction action)
Parameters
Type Name Description
int userThreshold

The threshold of users that triggers the detection of a raid.
int seconds

The time window (in seconds) to observe user joins.
PunishmentAction action

The punishment action to be taken against detected raids. PunishmentAction
Returns
Type Description
Task
Remarks

This command is restricted to users with Administrator permissions.

| Edit this page View Source

AntiRaid(int, int, PunishmentAction, StoopidTime)

Configures the Anti-Raid protection for the guild, setting the user threshold, detection time window, punishment action, and optional punishment duration.

Declaration
[Cmd("AntiRaid")]
[Aliases("AntiRaid")]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
[UserPerm(GuildPermission.Administrator)]
[Priority(1)]
public Task AntiRaid(int userThreshold, int seconds, PunishmentAction action, StoopidTime punishTime)
Parameters
Type Name Description
int userThreshold

The threshold of users that triggers the detection of a raid.
int seconds

The time window (in seconds) to observe user joins.
PunishmentAction action

The punishment action to be taken against detected raids. PunishmentAction
StoopidTime punishTime

The duration of punishment for the raiders (optional).
Returns
Type Description
Task
Remarks

This command is restricted to users with Administrator permissions.

AntispamIgnore()

Ignores the current text channel from Anti-Spam protection.

Declaration
public Task AntispamIgnore()
Returns
Type Description
Task
Remarks

This command adds the current text channel to the list of ignored channels for Anti-Spam protection. It is restricted to users with Administrator permissions and is used to exclude specific channels from Anti-Spam checks.

Implements

Discord.Commands.IModuleBase

Extension Methods

Extensions.ThrowIfNull<T>(T, string)
